name: InfoSteph - New Year, New Version, Same Me

content.html: So. Am I the only one who thinks it’s inappropriate for a boss to yell at their employee? Because the things I hear from people about their bosses yelling at them is disconcerting. That is an emotional outburst. What the heck is going on?
content.value:
So. Am I the only one who thinks it’s inappropriate for a boss to yell at their employee? Because the things I hear from people about their bosses yelling at them is disconcerting.

That is an emotional outburst. What the heck is going on?
